products.title: Rimini, Miami Yellow - Roller Blind
products.description: Well, the name says it all. The rimini's miami yellow is bright, funky, and summery. Due to its lightweight but sturdy fabric, it has a surprising level of opaqueness, despite its light colour. Not that you'll notice, with the colour of sunshine in your window. This is the ideal hue for creating a sunny, cheery kitchen, or a fun, energetic home office. Pair with creams and pretty florals for some country chic, or with sky blue shades for a fun, summery feel.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Yellow - Roller Blind
products.description: The soft sunshine of the palermo (blackout) yellow will add a cheery freshness to a window, even when it's doing its job of blocking out the outside light. Add to that the superior quality of the sleek blackout fabric and you have the perfect window covering. Use this blind in a modern country kitchen for both function and style; paired with other pastels and pretty florals, your window covering will give the room a summery, airy feel.

products.title: Capella, Golden Shimmer - Roller Blind
products.description: When the sun is shining you become fascinated with the myriad ways in which it dances with colours that had never shown a hint of life before. Capella golden shimmer allows you to celebrate that natural beauty all year round with its clever use of luxurious golden threads and timeless floral patterning. Take your decor further towards the luxury end of the spectrum and something magical happens. You feel like you can do anything with your decor, and become inspired to find finishing touches that will speak volumes.

products.title: Ferns, Gold - Roller Blind
products.description: Ferns in sand is the dreamy and relaxing fabric you have been searching for, and it's now available as a classic roller blind. The causal way in which the ferns twist and turn on the fabric, catching the light in different ways as they go is testament to the refined subtlety of the design. Transforming the guest bedroom used to be the job that would never end, but those days are now a thing of the past.

products.title: Watercolour, Gold - Roller Blind
products.description: When you're looking for a contemporary design that will fill any space, watercolour gold could be just what you need. The subtle way in which the greys ebb and flow into one another is accentuated by the gentle dash of gold that instantly catches your eye. If you're looking for a way to add a focal point to the guest bedroom, gold holds all the answers. By turning your window spaces into a piece of modern art, you can solve the old problem of deciding on a style that a dozen different guests will love.
